name: Columbus Park Benches
description: Smooth marble benches and granite ledges in the heart of Chinatown. Classic NYC street skating.
history: A staple of the downtown skate scene. Featured in countless video parts from Zoo York and Supreme riders.
bestTimes: Early mornings before the park fills up with tai chi groups.
transitDirections: J/Z to Chambers St or N/Q/R/W to Canal St.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include benches, ledges, flat ground, manual pads. Urban architecture repurposed for skating.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Manhattan skate scene in Chinatown. A staple of the downtown skate scene. Featured in countless video parts from Zoo York and Supreme riders.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: J/Z to Chambers St or N/Q/R/W to Canal St.. Early mornings before the park fills up with tai chi groups.
detailedNotes.warnings: Street spot â€” be respectful of the space and watch for security.
